meanings.sent1: The students presented their pioneering project at the science fair.
meanings.sent2: Her pioneering approach to problem-solving impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The pioneering chef decided to use unconventional ingredients in her dishes.
meanings.sent4: His pioneering spirit led him to explore uncharted territories in the business world.
meanings.sent5: The pioneering invention revolutionized the way people communicate.

meanings.definition: Leading the way in a particular field or activity
meanings.sent1: The company is known for its pioneering work in renewable energy.
meanings.sent2: She is a pioneering figure in the field of medicine.
meanings.sent3: The pioneering team won the championship for the third year in a row.
meanings.sent4: His pioneering efforts in education have inspired many students.
meanings.sent5: The pioneering artist's work set new standards in the art world.

meanings.definition: To be a pioneer in something
meanings.sent1: She hopes to pioneer a new approach to sustainable farming.
meanings.sent2: The organization aims to pioneer innovative solutions to social issues.
meanings.sent3: He decided to pioneer a new hiking trail through the mountains.
meanings.sent4: The team will pioneer a groundbreaking technique in medical research.
meanings.sent5: Their goal is to pioneer a more efficient way of transportation.
